preqs: CHM1011 or CHM1051 or CHM1022 or CHM1052 or CHM2735 or PSC1021 or PSC1022.

rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do true Otherwise Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {CHM1011, CHM1022, CHM1051, CHM1052, CHM2735, PSC1021, PSC1022}
For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do Any co-req unit set {MAE-CHEM, MAECHEM01} Otherwise true

description: This unit introduces the foundation concepts of nanotechnology and nanofabrication, the basic physics of the solid state, the unique properties of nanomaterials; characterisation techniques of materials. This unit also covers polymer synthesis and characterisation, polymer nanocrystals, functional polymers such as conductive polymers and block copolymers, supramolecular structures, and amphiphilic systems and their applications in nanofabrication.
